items.title: Health Data Management
items.description: Expert in collecting, entering, analyzing, and interpreting health data, with a strong background in the field.

items.title: Solid Knowledge in Epidemiology
items.description: Experienced in implementing and monitoring vaccination activities, with a constant commitment to ensuring effective coverage and optimal process execution.

items.title: Scientific Writing
items.description: Expertise in writing and publishing scientific articles, demonstrated by solid experience in the field.

items.title: Project Management
items.description: Experienced in supervising field teams, with proven skills in planning, organizing, and monitoring public health activities. Capable of writing detailed and relevant activity reports.

items.title: Interpersonal Skills
items.description: Excellent ability to communicate and interact with various stakeholders. Adaptability to different contexts, with an aptitude for initiative and independent work to effectively address challenges.

items.title: Personal Development
items.description: Commitment to continuous improvement through certifications, MOOCs, and additional training. Active participation in events to share experiences and highlight research achievements.
